typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RIMSource
RIMSource derive(NewColumn = locate(NoSalesReason, 'Other')) ~> GenericResearch
GenericResearch sink(input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RIMDataFlowOutput
